function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High occupant density facilitates the accrual of human-associated microorganisms","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and infection in crowded spaces","Mitigation":"Reducing occupant density and increasing ventilation","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, occupancy monitoring systems","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and staff","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Increased exposure risk associated with high occupant density and consistent contact demonstrated in COVID-19 outbreaks","Impact":"Higher likelihood of disease spread in crowded environments","Mitigation":"Implementing social distancing measures and hygiene protocols","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, social distancing sensors","People":"Passengers, staff, and visitors in confined spaces","Owner":"Cruise ship operators, building managers"},{"Description":"High transmissibility of COVID-19 in confined spaces within the built environment","Impact":"Elevated risk of disease transmission in enclosed areas","Mitigation":"Improved ventilation and spatial layout, limiting occupant density","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, spatial occupancy modeling tools","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and staff","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"}]}
